resources.string:
I'm Rodrigo Bossini. I teach a lot. I like playing chess and reading books.
 I buy books a lot and try to read as many as I can.
 I like purchasing stocks in brazilian stock market.
 I try to make the things vai I have to make with my heart.\ I guess that is it.
 Ah yes, I think I have a mission in this world but I'm yet to find it. I'm Rodrigo Bossini. I teach a lot. I like playing chess and reading books.
